snippet: The plan, which uses federal Medicaid expansion funds to buy private insurance for poor people, is being closely watched by other states.
abstract: Arkansas House of Representatives votes to allow state to keep taking federal money for expansion of Medicaid under Pres Obama's health care law and use it to buy private insurance for poor people.
lead_paragraph: The plan, which uses federal Medicaid expansion funds to buy private insurance for poor people, is being closely watched by other states.

headline.main: Arkansas House Votes to Extend Health Insurance Program
headline.print_headline: Arkansas House Votes to Extend Health Insurance Program

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
